title: Undergraduate Research Assistant
bullets: Communicate and work closely with my advisor (Gemma O'Connor) on the required features for the app, ensuring all measures are followed to maintain data clarity and integrity.
Use Svelte, Highcharts, and TailwindCSS to develop a responsive, fast, user friendly interface that facilitates meaningful interactions with the data.
Develop a REST API using Python and Fast API to support efficient querying of large data sets while maintaining low bandwidth usage when transporting data.
Configured, deployed, and optimized AWS Lambda functions for serverless architecture, ensuring seamless scalability and cost-efficiency in a cloud-based environment for the backend API.
Implemented automatic deployments of the front end to Cloudflare pages to ensure high availability.
company: University of Washington School of Oceanography
